item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde!
We meet on the 2nd and 4th Wednesdays of each month. We will be there even though it is holiday week Will you be on vacation this week? It would be a great opportunity for those of you who haven't been able to attend on Wednesdays during the school semester due to conflicts with class times.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with the Eiffel Tower
item.why: We laugh, have fun, and eat chocolate!We have two-and-one-half hours of French-only conversation twice each month. It really helps build fluency.We also meet for social events such as film showings.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: December -Meetup 4th Wednesday
